(OOC: Fire Fox, if that's what you'd like to be called, just to let you know 
since you obviously don't because of the mass e-mails you had to read, the 
Oblitercons are part of the Alliance, who are currently allied with the 
Maximals for the moment to fight the Newcomers.  They have stopped shooting 
the Maximals, though Tavatron running into battle just now really wouldn't 
know that)

Dark One/Hiss/Breakdown/Pyro/Scavenger:



Pyro felt the shots, waking up instantly.  His sight came up, seeing 
Tavatron.  With amazing pain, he was able to turn the top cannon of his 
current tank mode, attempting to fire a burst of continous flames from the 
cannon, he learned that he couldn't.  Cursing, because of his damage, he 
transformed to robot mode, running for where the other Oblitercons were, 
Scavenger in pursuit to get to his comrades.

---

"Slag it!"  Dark One yelled.  <Zardus!  Send a com to all Maximals and tell 
them to stop shooting at us, or they'll all die at our hands!>
Raising his rifle and taking aim, he fired two plasma blasts from his rifle 
off at Tavatron.

---

Breakdown smiled.  More stupid Maximals had come to mess with the 
Oblitercons.  They just never learned.  Raising his sonic blaster, he sent a 
sonic blast out at Tavatron.  

---

Raising his cannon, Hiss fired off three fusion blasts off at Tavatron.
